item.title: View Full Apple iOS App Purchase History
item.description: How to View iOS App Purchase History (including hidden purchases) To unhide hidden iOS app purchases made with your Apple ID, you will need to use the desktop iTunes application available on either macOS or Windows. Launch the iTunes application and login to your account using the same Apple ID you use on your iOS devices. Then, under the “Account” tab, click “View My Account”. Now on your account information page, navigate to “iTunes in the Cloud” and click “Manage” on your hidden purchases.
